__e: Someone with a large army, three large dragons, and no husband.
They've killed two of my men, one of the Dragons, and at least five of your guards.
I know they call you the Mother of Dragons and I know you love them, but you didn't grow them in your womb.
what does the Dragon of the Earth hope to achieve?
- So, if he's not lying, then someone is framing the Western dragons.
From the moment you chose to become a Dragon of the Heavens... I was destined to become a Dragon of the Earth.
